descriptionHtml:
<br /><br />Paid Mods Pack 1 - By ________
<br /><br />==================================================================================================================================
<br /><br />Lambda Locator - Jimo & Valve Artists            http://steamcommunity.com/id/jimo & http://steamcommunity.com/id/valve_artists
<br /><br />Gifts of Akatosh - Corvalho & Rafael De Jongh    http://steamcommunity.com/id/corvalho & http://steamcommunity.com/id/Rafael_De_Jongh
<br /><br />Sange Sword & Yasha Sword - T_Vidotto            http://steamcommunity.com/id/tvidotto
<br /><br />==================================================================================================================================
<br /><br />All Credit goes to Jimo, Valve Artists, Corvalho, Rafael_De_Jongh & T_Vidotto
<br /><br />==================================================================================================================================
<br /><br />Install
<br /><br />1. Export all files from RAR into Skyrim Data folder
<br /><br />2. Enjoy!
<br /><br />==================================================================================================================================
<br /><br />Lambda Locator - Description
<br /><br />----------------------------
<br /><br />There's a researcher located in Nightgate Inn who has lost a very important research specimen. Who stole it, and more importantly, why? 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Lambda Locator is a very short two step story quest inspired by the game Half-Life. The quest includes custom voice acting, and on completion of the quest you are rewarded with a story book and the Crowbar, Gordon Freeman's weapon of choice. 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />This submission was explicitly given permission to use Valve's intellectual property. Interested in making your own quest? Read my blog post to find out more about my experience.
<br /><br />==================================================================================================================================
<br /><br />Gifts Of Akatosh - Description
<br /><br />------------------------------
<br /><br />Features
<br /><br />The Gifts of Akatosh collection contains in total 10 completely custom items. 
<br /><br />There are four new weapons, being a dagger, an axe, a warhammer and a sword.To go along with a new crafting material, a fantastic shield and a completely epic armor! 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Where can i find it?
<br /><br />All the items are craftable, but not by just ordinary ingredients! To craft weapons worthy of a true Dragonborn you must get a set of exclusive items, the most important being the "Blessed Metal of Akatosh". 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />The Blessed Metal
<br /><br />There are two ways to obtain the Metal Ingot: 
<br /><br />The first method requires you to collect it from a chest on the back of High Hrothgard. (Remeber those gates where you trained your Whirlwind Sprint? Right behind them) The chest respawns its contents every now and then, so you can always come back for more. 
<br /><br />The second method is by crafting, it requires you to have a bunch of steel or silver ingots, and one amulet of Akatosh. 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Important
<br /><br />Both the metal and the items of this set can only be crafted in the Skyforge, and can be found under the "Steel" category, which requires the steel crafting perk to be accessed. 
<br /><br />The ingredients are quite a few and moderately hard to get, they variate just to make sure you won't go crafting it right after escaping Helgen.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Credits
<br /><br />Corvalho: Model Production [www.corvalho.com] 
<br /><br />Rafaël De Jongh: Texture Production [www.rafaeldejongh.com]
<br /><br />==================================================================================================================================
<br /><br />Yasha & Sange Sword - Description
<br /><br />---------------------------------
<br /><br />Hi guys! 
<br /><br />I decided to bring a little of Dota lore to Skyrim and would really appreciate to know what you guys think and listen to suggestions. 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />The Yasha sword was based on the Dota 2 Yasha concept and was allowed by Valve to be reproduced in Skyrim.. I made some adjustments to make if fit better the Skyrim world and I hope you guys like it. I am a huge fan of Skyrim and enjoyed a lot working on this set of weapons. 
<br /><br />The Sange sword was based on the Dota 2 Sange concept and was allowed by Valve to be reproduced in Skyrim.. I made some adjustments to make if fit better the Skyrim world and I hope you guys like it. I am a huge fan of Skyrim and enjoyed a lot working on this set of weapons. 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Instructions 
<br /><br />After subscribing the item can be crafted at any forge, it doesn't require a higher blacksmith skills but will require some ingredients 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Tutorials 
<br /><br />For anyone interested I have some tutorials related to asset creation for games at https://gumroad.com/tvidotto , and I usually stream my work at www.twitch.tv/tvidotto feel free to drop by to ask some feedback or listen to good music  
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Gallery 
<br /><br />I published a realtime gallery using the Marmoset viewer if you want to check the mesh and textures 
<br /><br />http://tvidotto.com/Skyrim/Skyrimgallery.html 
<br /><br />(you can click on the top right corner to open the options of a decomposed view) 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Contact 
<br /><br />For more of my work and future projects there is my site at www.tvidotto.com or the facebook page at www.facebook.com/tvidottoanimator 
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Thanks!
<br /><br />==================================================================================================================================
<br /><br />All Credit goes to the original creators!
<br /><br />
author: Jimo - Valve Artists - Corvalho - Rafael_De_Jongh - T_Vidotto
